comments:
Description:
Unhandled event loop exception occurs when selecting two parameters in layout.

build version: 
2.3.0 v20071127-1036

steps to reproduce:
1. New a report.
2. New two simple parameters.(Just clik OK in the New Parameter dislog).
3. Drag the two parameters to layout.
4. Select the two parameters with Rectangle Select.

Expected result: No error occurs.

Actual result: Error occurs.

Error log:
